info.title: Junior Front-End Developer
info.bio: Junior web developer with a strong focus on front-end and a solid foundation in back-end. Passionate about modern technologies and building intuitive, high-performance user interfaces. I enjoy working in teams, sharing ideas, and contributing actively to project and team growth.

1.title: Clean Code
1.description: Detail-oriented and organized; able to manage tasks in a structured and efficient way to ensure maintainable code.

2.title: Thoughtful Design
2.description: I pay attention to UI details to deliver memorable digital experiences, balancing aesthetics and functionality to create intuitive paths.

3.title: Team Working
3.description: Collaborative and proactive in group work, with strong communication and coordination skills to help reach common goals.

1.title: Site Manager
1.description: Management and coordination of construction activities, supervision of staff and monitoring of schedules.

2.title: Hardware Technician
2.description: Office printer lead; hardware maintenance (printers, copiers, scanners, notebooks, desktops); shipping department operator and on-site/online technical assistance for warranty products; inventory management and logistics support.

1.description: Project made for the final exam of the React specialization at Boolean. The site allows viewing a list of products (bikes), inspect details, compare items, and create a persistent wishlist using localStorage.

2.description: Group project inspired by a complete e-commerce, built from the database (MySQL) through the back-end (Node.js/Express) to the front-end (React). I mainly worked on the front-end implementation and also contributed to back-end parametric routes and team coordination.

3.description: Group project focused on front-end development (React) for a travel agency. The app manages scheduled trips, allows adding new ones and shows details and participants. Note: without a backend, entered data isn't persistent (localStorage can be added).
